A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Much like Kylo Ren I am conflicted about this movie. It has amazing scenes and moments\, but also very dull subplots. Everything with Rey (love her character)\, Luke or Kylo is great but the rest could have been trimmed down... I'd say it's good but not amazing. I liked Force Awakens better. Maybe the third time will be the charm?
